```{r}
library('DEoptimR')


Sphere= function(x)
  {
  Num=length(x)
	Sum = 0.0

	for (i in 1:Num)
	  {
		Sum =Sum+ x[i]**2.0
		}
	fun=Sum
  return(fun)
  }
# f(x)=0 x=(0,0) [âˆ’5.2, 5.2]


dim=10
RUNS=50
ITE=1500
Y=0;X=0

for(i in 1:RUNS)
  {
  JDE_R=JDEoptim(rep(-5.2, dim), rep(5.2, dim), Rastrigin,
         tol = 1e-20,NP=100, trace = FALSE,  maxiter =ITE)
  Y[i]=JDE_R$value

  }



MEAN=mean(Y)
STD=sd(Y)
MAX=max(Y)
MIN=min(Y)
cat('Rastrigin JDE DIM=',dim,'RUNS=',RUNS,'ITE=',ITE,'\n')
cat('MEAN=',MEAN,'\n')
cat('MAX',MAX,'\n')
cat('MIN=',MIN,'\n')
cat('STD',STD,'\n')


```
